summary: An ordinance authorizing the Superintendent of Public Utilities to enter into an agreement with the Seattle & Rainier Valley Railway Company with a view to securing the issuance of transfers to City lines by said company on payment of an eight and one-third cent (8 1/3 cent) fare, in consideration of certain credits on said company's indebtedness to the City for franchise gross earnings tax, and the issuance by the City of transfers to the company's lines on the payment of a like fare.
